bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , ailment of free-flux illness, in its final stage when patients suffer from aching and dysfunctional legs. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gu sui bu 骨碎補 quoting Zheng zhi yao jue 證治要訣 : 痢後風 ，因痢後下虛，不善調將，或多行，或房勞，或感外邪， 致兩脚酸軟，若痛若痹，遂成風痢 , “Wind after free-flux illness: If after a free-flux illness the lower [body section] is depleted and not well harmonized and nourished, or if one has walked much, or if he has taxed himself in the women’s quarters, or if he was affected by an external evil, so that both legs are sore and soft, with sensations of pain and blockage, this generates wind free-flux illness”, writes: 遂成痢風 , “This generates free-flux illness wind ”.
